title: Quiz 3: Lesson Planning & Teaching Skills
description: Assess your ability to plan lessons effectively, write behavioral objectives, and apply micro-teaching skills.

questions.question: Which of the following are essential components of a Lesson Plan?
questions.explanation: A lesson plan includes objectives, content, methods, activities, resources, and evaluation. Medical history is irrelevant.
questions.hint: Think about the structure of a class.

questions.question: In the SMART acronym for objectives, 'M' stands for ___BLANK___ and 'T' stands for ___BLANK___.
questions.explanation: SMART = Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Realistic, Time-bound.
questions.hint: Can you count it? Is there a deadline?

questions.question: Which part of a behavioral objective describes the minimum acceptable level of performance?
questions.explanation: The Standard or Criteria defines how well the student must perform (e.g., 'with 90% accuracy').

questions.question: Match the Micro-Teaching skill to its definition:

pairs.right: Introducing the topic to capture attention
Rewarding students to promote good behavior
Summarizing the main points at the end

questions.explanation: Set Induction starts the lesson; Stimulus Variation keeps attention; Reinforcement encourages; Closure wraps up.

questions.question: Order the steps in the Planning for Teaching process:
Verbs like 'know', 'understand', and 'appreciate' are suitable for behavioral objectives.
questions.explanation: These verbs are vague and not directly observable. Behavioral objectives use action verbs like 'list', 'describe', 'demonstrate'.

questions.question: Name the characteristic of a good teacher that involves providing emotional support, praise, and encouragement.
questions.explanation: Warmth refers to the teacher's friendly and supportive demeanor.

questions.question: What is the purpose of 'Questioning' during a lesson?

options.text: To promote interaction and check understanding

questions.explanation: Questioning engages students, checks comprehension, and promotes active thinking.

questions.question: Which of the following are tasks of a teacher?
questions.explanation: All listed options are core tasks of a teacher.

questions.question: ___BLANK___ involves using varied teaching techniques to take into account the individual differences of learners.
questions.explanation: Individualizing instruction meets the diverse needs of students.
